title: Responsive Portfolio Website using HTML/CSS
features: Designed and coded a fully responsive portfolio site using HTML5, CSS3, and media queries, achieving 100% mobile compatibility and 98% page load speed on Chrome and Safari.
Integrated multimedia content and social media icons, boosting user engagement by 35% and reducing bounce rate through intuitive navigation.
Collaborated with UX designers to implement WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, elevating accessibility scores and expanding audience reach.
